FAx.Settings.Templates.App.Help:
There are no configured templates yet.
To add a new template, click on the Create new template button (also available in the header bar).

FAx.Settings.Templates.App.Title: Configure Templates
FAx.Settings.Templates.Hint: Allows you to choose how character sheets will look like for new characters.
FAx.Settings.Templates.Title: Character sheet templates
FAx.Sheet.Messages.EmptyActor: It looks like your character doesn't have any content yet. You can change this in the Edit Mode or the Sheet Setup. The buttons to toggle the edit mode or open the setup can be found in the header bar.
FAx.Sheet.Name: Name
FAx.Template.Picker.Explain: Templates are a great way to have different sheets for different kinds of actors. We suggest using different templates for PCs, NPCs, and Mooks, as all of them have different sheet requirements.
FAx.Template.Picker.Help: To add new templates, click on the Configuration button below (also available in the header bar).
FAx.Template.Picker.Label: Templates
FAx.Template.Picker.Title: Choose Template
